name: h5-play
description: Creates video playlists from a folder, keeps track of where you left and plays videos in the default browser using HTML5
author: Wesley Anemam (wesleylira@gmail.com)

scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run copy:build
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run copy:publish && npm publish ./dist --tag beta
scripts.test: clear && npm run build && electron dist/index.js ~/Videos
